name: list_nft
attributes: # [doc = " NFT を任意の価格で出品（リスティング）します。"]
# [doc = " 署名チェックは `user: AccountInfo` のまま省略しています。"]
body: let info = & mut ctx . accounts . listing ;
info . seller = * ctx . accounts . user . key ;

fields.name: fee_payer
fields.attribute: # [doc = " トランザクション手数料支払い用（Signer が必要）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 出品ユーザー（署名チェック omitted intentionally）"]

fields.name: nft_acc
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 出品する NFT の TokenAccount"] # [account (constraint = nft_acc . owner == * user . key , constraint = nft_acc . mint == nft_mint . key ())]

fields.name: nft_mint
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 対象 NFT Mint アドレス（チェック用）"]

fields.name: listing
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 出品情報を保持する PDA"] # [account (init_if_needed , payer = fee_payer , seeds = [b"listing" , nft_mint . key () . as_ref () , user . key () . as_ref ()] , bump , space = 8 + 32 + 8 + 1)]
